attributes.action: Sir I would like the UK government to acknowledge the service, by military medal, of Service personnel who otherwise do not qualify for war zone medals because of their service in other locations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For example: The Royal Navy Submarine Service has many years of exemplary service where current and ex members of the service are and were under immense danger and pressure to ensure the security of the UK. This type of work is also carried out in the background and goes on 24/7. Men and women in the Royal Navy, Army and Airforce in similar positions have the right to be recognised for their unflinching efforts rather than by a half hearted pin badge, especially in light of politicians having rights to war zone medals for " visits".

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Please rewrite it.

At the moment your petition reads:

We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Sir I would like the UK government to acknowledge the service, by military medal, of Service personnel who otherwise do not qualify for war zone medals because of their service in other locations.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
